name: Dark Drake Bracers
description: This awesome set of Dark Drake Bracers are an important part to any armor and can be added to virtually any medieval costume. Larp metal arm Bracers are a necessary piece to any set of Larp equipment, protecting your lower arms you from bangs and knocks. Wear this pair of vambraces for a realistic appearance and proper protection on or off the battlefield.

name: Enclosed Arm Protection
description: Perfect protection for larp events this pair of enclosed larp arm protection has a flexible elbow. When worn with gambeson or padding this fully enclosed arm guard is very comfortable to wear and has two interior straps and a leather strap on the outside.

name: Gothic Arms
description: The Gothic Arm Set is definitely an improvement over traditional Larp Bracers. If you need complete protection on your arm and elbow, then this set is ideal for you. This pair will fit most anyone and was intended for Live Action Role Play events. This set of Larp arm guards are the perfect accessory for the ultimate Larp fighter.

name: Floating Elbows
description: Every experienced fighter would agree that the floating Elbow is a necessity in Larp combat. This set of articulated elbows has interlocking lames that freely follow the movements of your arms.  Intended to be worn over and fixed to the padded gambeson it will help deflect and protect you at the next Larp event.

name: RFB Bracers
description: This pair of RFB arm protection is the basic model intended for the price conscious warrior.  The simple design and polished metal surface makes this set of bracers perfect for any novice going to his first battle. The rounded edges ensure safety towards the wearer as well as the opponent making this pair of arm protection larp ready.

name: Bazuband
description: The Bazuband is a great piece of armor that completely protects the forearm, thumb and back of the hand from hits. Adorned with chainmail and sold as a pair, they can quickly be fixed to the arm using our buckle and strap system.  You are now ready to embrace battle!

name: Ratio Elbows
description: The unique two tone antique brass on black Ratio Elbows are beautiful and offer great protection that is necessary when fighting on the front lines.  Independent from the bracer it allows you to move your arm without hindrance, while providing excellent cover.

name: Viking Arm Protection
description: The larp Viking Arm Protection is made to resemble splint armor and is trimmed with a nice leather border. This pair of larp armguards have a darkened metal hammered finish and work great for LARPing and historical re-enactments.

name: Floating Elbows, Dark
description: Just about any skilled fighter may agree that the Dark Articulated Elbow is essential in Larp battle. This pair of floating elbows feature interlocking lames that conform to the motions of your arms. Designed to be utilized over and mounted to the padded gambeson it helps deflect as well as provide protection to you while you fight.

name: Jack Chains
description: Jack Chains are an important part of equipment for the light infantry soldier who wishes to protect his arms from slashing.  A series of plates are linked together by rings that are placed on the outside of the arm, they are an excellent companion for the Imperial Gambeson.

name: Warrior Bracers
description: This classic pair of Larp Warrior Bracers is a necessary piece of arm armor and can be worn with any period costume. Larp steel arm Bracers are an important addition to any Larp gear shielding you from sword blows on the lower arms. Use these vambraces for a classical look or protection on or off the battlefield.

name: King Bracers
description: This pair of medieval King bracers have a raised cross pattern with an epic acid grey finish. These Larp vambraces are an important addition to any larp gear providing adequate protection on the lower arms when in battle. Arm armor can be worn as a costume piece adding a little class to your medieval attire.

name: Warrior Bracers, Dark
description: This timeless set of Dark Larp Warrior Bracers are a crucial part of lower arm armor that can be added to virtually any medieval attire. Larp metal arm Bracers are a valuable component to any piece of Larp equipment, guarding you from bangs and knocks on your lower arms. Wear this pair of vambraces for a historical appearance or proper protection on or...

name: Dark Bazuband
description: The Dark Bazuband set is a useful piece of body armor that effectively shields the forearm, thumb and back of the hand from strikes during Larp combat. Embellished with chainmail and sold as set, they are able to easily be attached your lower arm by making use of our buckle and strap system. You are now ready to enter into battle!
